content.rendered:
Directed by K.V. Guhan

Star Shivani Rajashekar. Sandeep Bharadwaj. Harsha Chemudu. Divya Drishti. Riyaz Khan. Priyadarshi. Satyam Rajesh. Divya Sripada. Thrigun ((as Adith Arun))

Written by K.V. Guhan

Language Telugu. Tamil

Producers Ravi P. Raju Datla. Vijay Dharan Datla

Production Ramantra creations. Suresh Productions
